name: Edinburgh Highland Show Outdoor Event
summary: A fun and enjoyable event to attend
description: A thrilling outdoor event that you are able to attend with your friends and family. Throughout the duration of the event you will be able to try out different foods and drinks available at our service and meet new people

name: Three Sisters Drink N'Socialise
summary: A thrilling outdoor event at the Three Sisters outdoor courtyard
description: An exciding outdoor event where you can eat, drink and socialise with your friends

name: Agile Project Management Conference
summary: This indoor event gives people a chance to learn more about how to manage projects.
description: Throughout this event, various agile project management techniques such as Sprints, Kanban Boards, Sprint Boards are going to be covered to fully prepare you to succesfully manage projects as part of a team
